review: Today I have visiting first time in hospital. It's very good experience for me... I will be happy to see the doctor ... He speaking very friendliness ...I am so happy.

I have been a loyal patient of Dr. Aruldas for as long as I can remember, and my trust in his medical expertise has only grown over the years. His ability to diagnose and treat fevers with a single injection has always amazed me. Even when tablets were prescribed, they proved to be incredibly effective.

What sets Dr. Aruldas apart is not only his medical skill but also the well-organized and welcoming environment of his clinic. It's evident that he and his team are dedicated to providing healthcare that's not only effective but also affordable. In a world where healthcare costs can be a burden, Dr. Aruldas truly embodies the belief that 'health is wealth.'

I want to express my gratitude for the painless and successful treatments I've received throughout my life. Dr. Aruldas, you've made a significant positive impact on my health and well-being, and I'm sure many others feel the same way. Thank you for your dedication and commitment to improving lives through your medical practice.\
I felt somewhat relieved from wheezing problem, soon after I took the first dosage. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering with a small tumor on my leg, which gave me an immense pain and couldn't walk... Visited here, doctor literally cleaned the tumor (I was literally crying as I couldn't bear the pain as my infection spread all over toe and swelled too). Doctor asked to bear for few mins, so I had to as I don't have any choice. The very next day i.e. after 12 hrs of his treatment, I could believe my eyes as the swelling has drastically reduced and I was able to walk. Surely I'll refer Dr. Benedict to my people.
